title: Crispy Polenta Bites + Polenta in the Instant Po
directions: Add water, polenta and salt to your pressure cooker and 1/2 -1 teaspoons of your seasoning, give it a good whisk. Add lid to the pressure cooker and set your knob to sealing.

Select Porridge and use the ‘-‘ button to adjust the time to 5 minutes. Once the polenta has finished cooking, allow it to rest for 10 minutes before opening the pressure cooker. Hit the cancel button.
Turn the knob to venting and allow any remaining pressure to release. Remove the lid tilting it away from you.
Whisk the polenta and give it a taste. Add any additional salt, seasoning, cheese or chopped herbs.
You can serve the polenta soft straight from the instant pot or you can continue on for the baked bites.
ingredients: 1/2 – 1 teaspoon salt (start with 1/2 teaspoon if using broth)
1-2 teaspoons of your favorite spices (I have used cajun, Italian, taco, berbere ect)
